Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $23.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Turn the backseat into a closet on wheels

Traveling in the car with dresses and clothes?Yes,This Car Clothes Hanger Bar from Mysbiker makes it easy to keep your clothes tidy and clean. when you’re on the go. Whether you’re traveling for work or just taking a road trip.Your clothes will stay fresh and wrinkled- free as they hanging in your vehicle .This bar can be attached to the overhead handles or garment hooks on your back seat, It’s more stable and it accommodates a far greater load than traditional bars.You may need this during a road trip, family vacations, or before an important meeting.

Easy To Install And Expand Without Much Effort

Two Ways to Install: Fix the end hook in the lower position to hook the handle, or rotate vertically to hang on the ceiling hook.Universal Fit: The bysbiker expandable clothes bar can extend from 35 in to 59 in. This allows more space for hanging and to perfectly fit most vehicles.Perfect for college students, movings,and cross-country road tours.Rubberized grip sleeves and dividers keep clothes from sliding during driving.Easy to Install: The bar has dual mount hangers that can quickly attach to interior grab handles and garment hooks,no tools required.

Heavy-duty Metal Car Clothes Bar

Heavy-duty, metal car clothes bar holds up to 30 lbs.Perfect for college students, moving, vacationers and cross-country road tours, it expands from 35″ to 59″ to fit most cars, and features adjustable grip sleeves and dividers to keep clothes from sliding, even on the tightest turns.

Extendable

Universal Fit with Extendable Bars: Our extendable clothes bar can extend from 35 inches to 59 inches and maximally holds up to 30 lbs of clothing to accommodate sedans, vans, SUVs,Trucks and more.

Non-Slip Rubber Grips

The expandable Car Clothes Bar is covered with anti-slip rubber to keep the clothes from sliding around during driving.

Material
PVC+TPU ABS+Rubber Alloy steel Alloy Steel+Rubber

Color
Black Black Silver/Black Black

Size
8.3 x 6.1 x 3.6″ 6.7 x 2.4 x 3.9″ 10.6 x 4.5 x 1.9″ 36 x 2.6 x 2.5″

Application
Phone below 6.5″ like Iphone12、11,Pro Max X XR Xs 7s 8 Plus 7 6s 6, Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 A71 A51 A10,Note20 10 /9/8/4,Xiaomi, Huawei, oppo LG, Sony, Moto, Google Pixel, Nexus etc. 4″-6.5″devices： Such as Iphone12、11,Pro Max X XR Xs 7s 8 Plus 7 6s 6, Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 A71 A51 A10,Note20 10 /9/8/4,Xiaomi, Huawei, oppo LG, Sony, Moto, Google Pixel, Nexus etc. Motorcycles, bicycles, scooters and any vehicle where there are holes or spokes on a wheel. Sedans,Vans,SUVs,Trucks and Jeep.Such as Ford (Focus ST Explorer)、 Honda CRV、 Toyota （Corolla E350 ）、Chrysler （Mini Van 2019 f250）、 Equinox 、Canyon 、Nissan （Pathfinder）、Rogue、 Murano、 Traverse 、Acadia（2014 GMC ）and etc.

Key Feature
Universal fit,Waterproof,Sensitive Tough Screen,Large Capacity Shockproof,360°Rotation,Wide Compatibility,One-hand Operation,Waterproof Easy to Lock, 110dB Alarm Deterrent, Waterproof, Anti-theft Expand up to 65 inches,Durable and Load-bearing,Easy to Install

►A Moving Wardrobe: The Mysbiker car clothes hanger bar would keep your clothes wrinkle-free during road trips,family vacations,laundry or business trips where your clothes need to be kept or hung neatly without collapsing in your vehicles.This clothes bar is Really helped in packing for a cross country trip,car camping.Just a magic wand will turn your car into a mobile wardrobe.
►Universal Fit: The vehicle clothes hanging rack that fits most every vehicle on the road.Expandable from 33 inch to 63.5 inch easy to adjust the length,max holds up to 50 lbs of clothing to accommodate sedans,vans,SUVs,Trucks and more.
► Rubber Grips and Rings: The clothes rod bar adopts 3 sections of Non-Slip Grips Dividers and rubberized grip sleeves enable you to organize and not worry about things flying all over the place , even on tight turns for a smoother.so you can hang a suit, dress shirts, button ups, pants, etc
►Durable and Load-bearing: The Car Hanger are constructed of rust-resistant, powder coated steel,which is durable and load-bearing. Up to 50 pounds (approximately 22.7 kg), which means you can hang 80-100 T-shirts or 40-50 suits at the same time even when fully extended.
►Easy to Install: There are two ways to connect the hanging bar : fix the end hook in the lower position to hook the handle, or rotate vertically to hang on the ceiling hook. just pivoting end hangers can be turned down to hook over car grab handles, or rotated upright to hang securely from garment hooks.

Turn the backseat into a closet on wheels

  • Traveling in the car with dresses and clothes?Yes,This Car Clothes Hanger Bar from Mysbiker makes it easy to keep your clothes tidy and clean. when you’re on the go. Whether you’re traveling for work or just taking a road trip.Your clothes will stay fresh and wrinkled- free as they hanging in your vehicle .
  • This bar can be attached to the overhead handles or garment hooks on your back seat, It’s more stable and it accommodates a far greater load than traditional bars.
  • You may need this during a road trip, family vacations, or before an important meeting.

Easy To Install And Expand Without Much Effort

  • Two Ways to Install: Fix the end hook in the lower position to hook the handle, or rotate vertically to hang on the ceiling hook.
  • Universal Fit: The bysbiker expandable clothes bar can extend from 35 in to 59 in. This allows more space for hanging and to perfectly fit most vehicles.Perfect for college students, movings,and cross-country road tours.Rubberized grip sleeves and dividers keep clothes from sliding during driving.
  • Easy to Install: The bar has dual mount hangers that can quickly attach to interior grab handles and garment hooks,no tools required.

Heavy-duty, metal car clothes bar holds up to 30 lbs.Perfect for college students, moving, vacationers and cross-country road tours, it expands from 35″ to 59″ to fit most cars, and features adjustable grip sleeves and dividers to keep clothes from sliding, even on the tightest turns.

Extendable

Universal Fit with Extendable Bars: Our extendable clothes bar can extend from 35 inches to 59 inches and maximally holds up to 30 lbs of clothing to accommodate sedans, vans, SUVs,Trucks and more.

Product Description

Power Tool Organizer

3 Quick and Easy Ways This Power Tool Orangizer Wall Mount Will Save Money, Time and Make You Money Even If Your Already the Best Tradesperson in the world!!

STOP WASTING MONEY: Made from ultra durable SPCC cold rolled steel, this power tool organizer is designed by professionals and is built to last which means you wont be wasting your hard earned money on fragile timber tool organizers!SAVE TIME: This power tool storage rack features 5 slots to hold cordless power tools, and 2 open shelves to keep your tools organized in one central location. No more wasting time looking through drawers , toolboxes and random places for your tools again which means you will have time to sit down and watch the game or spend more time with the kids!MAKE MORE MONEY: Holds up to 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½” and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and complete projects fast so you can get to your next customer/client!

WARNING : Do Not Even Consider Buying Another Power Tool Organizer Until You Read This:

HAPPY WIFE , HAPPY LIFE: Having your tools organized and ready to go at a moments notice for any project will allow you to complete those honey-do list jobs that you’ve been getting bugged about for months which means you will be in the good books and not the dog house!INCREDIBLE SUPPORT: Each exclusive tool storage shelf can support up to 66 pounds which means you’ll feel safe that your load and tools will always be supported!PROTECTION AGAINST DAMAGE: Featuring a high-quality powder-coated finish which helps you protect against damage and is easy to wipe clean !

The Perfect Solution If You Want To Look Like A Professional Tradesperson Even If You Are Just A Avid Do-It-Yourself’er :

ALL THE GEAR BUT NO IDEA ? : These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill rack features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!STRESS FREE INSTALLATION: This garage storage rack is so quick and easy to assemble even the most amateur DIY’ers can do it with ease! Fewer screws are needed compared to other ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!WHAT’S INCLUDED:(1) x Steel Tool OrganizerAssembly HardwareWall Mounting HardwareAssembly Instructions

Steel
TOOLGANIZE YOUR GARAGE: Enjoy unsurpassed shop organization with the Toolganize Power Tool Storage Organizer. Keep all of your tools organized in one central location which means you’ll never be wasting time looking for your tools again!
DESIGNED BY TRADESMEN , BUILT FOR STRENGTH : Made from powder-coated SPCC cold rolled steel for heavy duty strength and durability, this wall tool organizer is designed by professionals to last which means you wont be wasting your money on fragile timber tool organizers!
ROOM FOR ALL YOUR TOOLS: This garage tool organizer has 2 solid shelves, 5 drill holder slots for cordless power tools, holds 14 jobber drill bits starting form 1/16” to ½”, and dedicated storage for screwdrivers and hand tools Which means you’ll locate your tools quickly and get your jobs done faster!
FLAT PACKED & EASY TO ASSEMBLE: This garage storage rack is quick and easy to assemble! The garage tool organizer wall mount needs fewer screws than ordinary timber power tool holders and also comes with wall mounting hardware which means no more pulling your hair out over stripped nuts!
ALL THE GEAR AND NO IDEA?: These heavy-duty tool organizers and storage drill racks features colors to match your favorite power tool brands which means even if your not a professional tradesperson you can look like one!

From the brand

DaFang is committed to developing and designing organizer and storage clean tools products, included broom rack and mop holder. Save your home space and make your life more easy.

IMILLET Broom Organizer

Tidy Your Home: 5 ball slots and 6 hooks design, organize your annoying cleaning tools within small space.
Spring Loaded: Special spring clips design with rolling rubber ball that make sure the broom and mop will not fall out,including wet mop, dirty rakes, stick vacuum and other heavy stuff
Wide Compatible To Everywhere: Apply to your garage, garden, kitchen, laundry, offices and more. It is strong and sturdy. Keep solid on the wall with the slots and screws (Included). It can organize most of tools of your home.
Heavy Duty: Mop holder grip everything tightly and securely. Each rolling ball holds up to 6.5 pounds of weight(smooth rod is up to 3 pounds), holder can hold up to about 11 tools in total. Made of high quality ABS and slots and screws.We upgraded our products after 2018 July 1st, and we improved the quality of this products that are easy-to-drop. Now the products can grip everything tightly and securely.
Easy Install: Wall mounted, detailed installation steps on the package. Easy to install with slots and screws (included).

  • There are 5 ball slots and 6 hooks so you can organize as much cleaning utilities, organizer designed to hold various household objects with handles of varying thickness, Hooks can be folded up and out of the way.
  • Simply insert a handle into a slot and a rounded, spring loaded, rolling ball automatically adjusts to the handle’s thickness and grips it securely, Easy release by lifting the handle.
  • Fast and Easy to install, 6 screws to hold the wall mount organizer to ensure strong and sturdy holding. Each rolling ball holds up to 6.5 pounds of weight(smooth rod is up to 3 pounds), holder can hold up to about 11 tools in total.

Read more

Color:Balck

Weight:350g*2

Size:16.75*2.36*3.15in

Support handle: diameter between 0.6-1.1 inch

Please attention:It is not suitable for the big handle of garden tools

Package Included:

  • 2 X Wall Mount Broom Holder
  • 12 X Screws
  • 12 X Screw Cover

Read more

Upgrade Broom Rack

The new broom holder allows for the handle to slide in from the front and is held tight in place.Just use one hand to put broom in holder,even the kids also can do it,easy to use.

Space Saver

Imillet broom holder can keep your broom, closet, kitchen, garage, garden, bathroom, or laundry room in organized. Also suitable for garden and yard tools racks storage and organize.

5 Slots 6 Hooks

5 postions can hold up mop, broom, dustpan, shovel, small vacuum, small garden tools and others.6 foldable hooks are great for rags, bristle brushes, swifters, fly swatter and other small tools.

Product Description

Jerry & Maggie is a global distributor, developer, and manufacturer of Home Décor and Office Supplies.
We established on the strength of brand names and private label programs in 2011, we develop and craft unrivaled products that drive sales for years. Explore our site to understand and enjoy all we have to offer. There must be a product you like because our designers create our fascination in the heart of the art and love.

Composition of two main parts – the position and the distance between two parts can be adjusted and rotated to best fit your needs – a great decoration at home or office

Flat surface and sturdy construct – excellent craftsmanship process – perfect for placing office supplies, documents, books, and plants

Jerry & Maggie’s adjustable storage rack is great for storage, organize,and clean up your desktop and workstation. Made of natural wood which provide stability and security.

Adjustable and Style

Features 2 separate parts that can be arranged close together to create a small shelf rack, arranged further apart to create a longer shelf, or set together at any angle you choose to best fit your space and your style.

More space for table

You can have more space for your workstation. You can organize books, office supplies, and other stuff to clean up your desktop space in your ideal way.

Easy installation

The product is assembly required. The storage rack is easy to install and change the direction. You just need to move the parts and arrange the way you need.

Material of natural wood , definitely no pungent scent – non-toxic | green healthy life style | sturdy board
Composition of two main parts – the position and the distance between two parts can be adjusted and rotated to best fit your needs – a great decoration at home or office
Flat surface and sturdy construct – excellent craftsmanship process – perfect for placing office supplies, documents, books, and plants
Lightweight ( 6 lb ) and 5 units organizer easy to transport and carry – save space on your office desktop – provide more options to meet your style
Approximate Displayed Product Measurement (L*H*W): 16*15.8*6.8 inches

Jerry & Maggie’s adjustable storage rack is great for storage, organize,and clean up your desktop and workstation. Made of natural wood which provide stability and security.

Adjustable and Style

Features 2 separate parts that can be arranged close together to create a small shelf rack, arranged further apart to create a longer shelf, or set together at any angle you choose to best fit your space and your style.

More space for table

You can have more space for your workstation. You can organize books, office supplies, and other stuff to clean up your desktop space in your ideal way.

Easy installation

The product is assembly required. The storage rack is easy to install and change the direction. You just need to move the parts and arrange the way you need.

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $79.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:19:50 UTC – Details)


Tackle your next adventure with the Rightline Gear Range Jr car top and roof rack cargo carrier. Designed for use WITH or WITHOUT a roof rack, you can attach the straps of this roof cargo bag to your vehicle’s roof rack or use the included car clips to attach the straps to a vehicle’s door frame weather molding – the only revolutionary solution of its kind that WILL NOT interfere with passenger headroom. Rated Weatherproof +, the Range Jr’s UV-protected PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT shell, urethane-coated zipper, and hook-and-loop-close zipper flap provide a dual barrier from the elements. Featuring 10 cubic feet of rooftop storage, this compact car luggage carrier roof bag allows you to transport your cargo and your passengers without compromising on safety, comfort, or convenience. All Rightline Gear products come backed by a 1-year manufacturer’s warranty, so Gear up with confidence!
Car Top Carrier: Our convenient roof cargo carrier allows you to keep your gear up top, so you can transport belongings and passengers without compromising on safety, comfort, or convenience
Intuitive Features: Specially designed to keep your gear dry, our waterproof car roof cargo carrier features welded seams, an urethane-coated zipper, and a hook-and-loop-close zipper flap
Quality Construction: Constructed of UV-protected PVC semi-coated mesh, our durable vehicle cargo carriers are designed to keep your belongings dry and won’t fly off your roof
Simple Setup: Simply attach the straps of the roof bag to your vehicle’s roof rack or use the included car clips to attach the straps to your vehicle’s door frame weather molding
Seamless Storage: Our rooftop cargo bag folds down for storage in the included stuff sack; Car roof bag, 4 attachment straps, 4 car clips, and stuff sack with sewn-in setup guide included

What makes Rightline Gear Range Car Top Carriers Weatherproof +?

A step up from Rightline Gear’s Ace Car Top Carriers, The Range Carriers add a urethane coated zipper. A zipper flap adds extra protection. All seams of the carrier are welded watertight and Rightline Gear’s proprietary PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT stands up to the elements for years to come. Other carriers may claim to be waterproof or weatherproof, but they do not have the features to back it up.

Read more

Features

Urethane Coated Zipper

The Range Car Top Carriers use Urethane Coated Zippers as the first line of defense against moisture and the elements, while other carriers use standard zippers with exposed teeth that let water in!

PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT

High velocities are no match for Range Car Top Carriers, thanks to their heavy-duty, Xtra Tough PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT construction.

Stuff Sack

All of Rightline Gear’s Range Car Top Carriers come with a handy stuff sack so your carrier is always on hand when you need it, and easily stows away when you don’t.

Read more

Attachment Methods

WITH a Roof Rack

Loop the included straps around the roof rack side rails or cross bars.

WITHOUT a Roof Rack – Car Clips

Start with the Car Clips on the (4) attachment straps. Open the vehicle’s doors and hook the Car Clips under the door frame weather molding.

Read more

Standard Airline Carry-on.

Carrier Fit Guide

To ensure a proper fit, please measure your vehicle’s roof (as shown above) and compare to the carrier’s dimensions.

  • Range Jr: 36” L x 32” W x 15” H
  • Compact Cars to SUVs, minivans
  • Popular Examples: Honda Civic, Toyota Corolla, Ford Focus, Chevy Cruze
  • Will fit larger vehicles as well

Carrier Capacity Guide

The guide below will give you a general idea of how many suitcases each Rightline Gear Car Top Carrier will hold. The guide references a standard Airline Carry-on Bag (14″ W x 8″ D x 22″ H, 1.43 cu ft).

  • Range 3: 18 cu ft = ~12 Carry-on Bags
  • Sport 3: 18 cu ft = ~12 Carry-on Bags
  • Range 2: 15 cu ft = ~10 Carry-on Bags
  • Sport 2: 15 cu ft = ~10 Carry-on Bags
  • Ace 2: 15 cu ft = ~10 Carry-on Bags
  • Range Jr: 10 cu ft = ~7 Carry-on Bags
  • Sport Jr: 10 cu ft = ~7 Carry-on Bags
  • Ace Jr: 9 cu ft = ~6 Carry-on Bags

Read more

Make your garage, storage room or playroom much more organized!

Help your child develop a good habit of putting the equipment away!

Equipped with top quality smooth rolling wheels

The wheels are durable, and roll very smoothly. It will be easy to move the organizer indoor and outdoor.

Thoughtful and unique design in the base

The tight mesh base make sure the small size things can be stored. Never worry about having no place for your little toys, table tennis, etc.

Easy Installation

The screws, tools and instructions are included.

Tackle your next adventure with the Rightline Gear Range 3 car top and roof rack cargo carrier. Designed for use WITH or WITHOUT a roof rack, you can attach the straps of this roof cargo bag to your vehicle’s roof rack or use the included car clips to attach the straps to a vehicle’s door frame weather molding – the only revolutionary solution of its kind that WILL NOT interfere with passenger headroom. Rated Weatherproof +, the Range 3’s UV-protected PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT shell, urethane-coated zipper, and hook-and-loop-close zipper flap provide a dual barrier from the elements. Featuring 18 cubic feet of rooftop storage, this car luggage carrier roof bag allows you to transport your cargo and your passengers without compromising on safety, comfort, or convenience. All Rightline Gear products come backed by a 1-year manufacturer’s warranty, so Gear up with confidence!
Car Top Carrier: Our convenient roof cargo carrier allows you to keep your gear up top, so you can transport belongings and passengers without compromising on safety, comfort, or convenience
Intuitive Features: Specially designed to keep your gear dry, our waterproof car roof cargo carrier features welded seams, an urethane-coated zipper, and a hook-and-loop-close zipper flap
Quality Construction: Constructed of UV-protected PVC semi-coated mesh, our durable vehicle cargo carriers are designed to keep your belongings dry and won’t fly off your roof
Simple Setup: Simply attach the straps of the roof bag to your vehicle’s roof rack or use the included car clips to attach the straps to your vehicle’s door frame weather molding
Seamless Storage: Our rooftop cargo bag folds down for storage in the included stuff sack; Car roof bag, 4 attachment straps, 4 car clips, and stuff sack with a sewn-in set up guide included

What makes Rightline Gear Range Car Top Carriers Weatherproof +?

A step up from Rightline Gear’s Ace Car Top Carriers, The Range Carriers add a urethane coated zipper. A zipper flap adds extra protection. All seams of the carrier are welded watertight and Rightline Gear’s proprietary PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT stands up to the elements for years to come. Other carriers may claim to be waterproof or weatherproof, but they do not have the features to back it up.

Read more

Features

Urethane Coated Zipper

The Range Car Top Carriers use Urethane Coated Zippers as the first line of defense against moisture and the elements, while other carriers use standard zippers with exposed teeth that let water in!

PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT

High velocities are no match for Range Car Top Carriers, thanks to their heavy-duty, Xtra Tough PVC Semi-Coated Mesh XT construction.

Stuff Sack

All of Rightline Gear’s Range Car Top Carriers come with a handy stuff sack so your carrier is always on hand when you need it, and easily stows away when you don’t.

Read more

Attachment Methods

WITH a Roof Rack

Loop the included straps around the roof rack side rails or cross bars.

WITHOUT a Roof Rack – Car Clips

Start with the Car Clips on the (4) attachment straps. Open the vehicle’s doors and hook the Car Clips under the door frame weather molding.

Standard Airline Carry-on.

Carrier Fit Guide

To ensure a proper fit, please measure your vehicle’s roof (as shown above) and compare to the carrier’s dimensions.
